dashboard.heading: Recognition decision data
dashboard.instructions: Use the filters to choose the datasets to view and download
dashboard.guidanceLink: Guidance on decision outcomes and routes

publication.caption: Publishing decision data
publication.heading: Are you sure you want to publish the following decision data?
publication.body: Publishing this data will overwrite any existing decision data for this profession. Are you sure you want to do this?

confirmation.heading: This recognition decision dataset has been published.
confirmation.body: Back to recognition decision data listing page.

confirmation.heading: This recognition decision dataset has been saved.
confirmation.body:
Saving a new draft will unpublish any existing decision data for this profession. Are you sure you want to do this?

Data will only be visible for this profession when the new draft is published.

submission.caption: Submitting decision data
submission.heading: Are you sure you want to submit the following decision data to be reviewed before publication?

confirmation.heading: This recognition decision dataset has been submitted to central administrators before publication.
confirmation.body:
You've submitted data to be reviewed. You should contact the reviewer to let them know - they will not be notified automatically.

Email RPR@beis.gov.uk if you do not know who to contact.

profession.empty: Select the profession you wish to enter decision data for

organisation.notValidForProfession: Select a regulatory authority that regulates this profession

year.empty: Select the year you wish to enter decision data for
year.exists: Decision data already exists for this year

tableHeading.noAfterComp: Not accepted - additional conditions not met

labels.no: Not accepted - qualifications not recognised (route {route}, country {country})
labels.noAfterComp: Not accepted - additional conditions not met (route {route}, country {country})

confirmation.heading: Are you sure you want to edit the following decision data?
confirmation.caption: Editing decision data
confirmation.bodyUnpublish:
Editing this dataset will unpublish any existing decision data for this profession. Are you sure you want to do this?
There will be no data available on this profession until the new draft is published.
confirmation.bodyUnsubmit:
Editing this dataset will unsubmit any existing decision data for this profession. Are you sure you want to do this?
There will be no data available on this profession until the new draft is published.

routes.duplicate: It looks like you've already added a route with that name - enter a different one
